purpose: To provide a comprehensive resource for machine learning practitioners to find tools and libraries for deploying, monitoring, versioning, and scaling machine learning models in production environments
principle: Curated list format that aggregates and categorizes open source tools and libraries relevant to production machine learning
reusability: Open source list that can be referenced by developers and researchers for selecting appropriate tools; easily extendable by contributing new entries
limitations: As a curated list, it does not provide direct functionality but serves as a directory; the quality and maintenance of listed tools may vary
name: awesome-production-machine-learning
description: A curated list of awesome open source libraries to deploy, monitor, version and scale your machine learning
highlight: Comprehensive curated list of tools for deploying, monitoring, and scaling machine learning in production
